reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 511/01: FEES FOR SERVICES PROVIDED BY THE REGISTRAR GENERAL
reg_info.reg_name_text: FEES FOR SERVICES PROVIDED BY THE REGISTRAR GENERAL
reg_info.act_under: Vital Statistics Act   Loi sur les statistiques de l’état civil

content.section: Registration more than one year after birth
content.content: 1. The fee for registration of the birth of a child that has not been registered within one year from the date of birth is $50. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The fee for registration of the birth of a child that has not been registered within one year from the date of birth is $50. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The fee for a change of name certificate is $15. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The fee for a change of name certificate is $15. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 2.

content.content: 3. (1) The fee for a birth certificate is $25. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 3 (1). (2) The fee for a replacement birth certificate is $35. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) The fee for a birth certificate is $25. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 3 (1).

(2) The fee for a replacement birth certificate is $35. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 3 (2).

content.content: 4. The fee for a marriage certificate is $15. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. The fee for a marriage certificate is $15. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 4.

content.content: 5. The fee for a death certificate is $15. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. The fee for a death certificate is $15. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 5.

content.content: 6. (1) The fee for a certified copy of a registration of birth is $35. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 6 (1). (2) The fee for a replacement certified copy of a registration of birth is $45. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 6 (2).
content.raw_html:
6. (1) The fee for a certified copy of a registration of birth is $35. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 6 (1).

(2) The fee for a replacement certified copy of a registration of birth is $45. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 6 (2).

content.content: 7. The fee for a certified copy of a registration of marriage, death or still-birth is $22. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 7.
content.raw_html: 7. The fee for a certified copy of a registration of marriage, death or still-birth is $22. O. Reg. 511/01, s. 7.

content.content: 8. The fee payable for a service provided by the Registrar General under the Act is increased by $15 if, (a) the person who requests the service requests that it be provided by the end of the second business day following the day the request is made; and (b) the service is provided to the person by the end of the second business day following the day the request is made. O. Reg. 430/03, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
8. The fee payable for a service provided by the Registrar General under the Act is increased by $15 if,

(a) the person who requests the service requests that it be provided by the end of the second business day following the day the request is made; and

(b) the service is provided to the person by the end of the second business day following the day the request is made. O. Reg. 430/03, s. 1.

content.content: 9. Revoked: O. Reg. 511/01, s. 9 (4). (See also: O. Reg. 163/05, s. 1.)
content.raw_html: 9. Revoked: O. Reg. 511/01, s. 9 (4). (See also: O. Reg. 163/05, s. 1.)
